overview: Hairy men, dominant men, submissives bent over and begging for a double-dicking, lean and muscular men awash in sweat and semen, in rage and rut, no-fear no-limits fuck-aholics. The men of Treasure Island Media go at sex and life with an attitude summed up in the title: Fearless. From total sex-slaves to dominant brutal fuckers, from submissive ex-Marines to testosterone-driven studs with baseball-sized meat swingin' between their legs. These fuckers lay it all on the line to explore the extremes of real man-to-man sex. Fearless fucking man-apes doin' what they were born to do. Here's what happens when you put 'em together and let the testosterone run free.
title: Fearless
